name: พระอาทิตย์ตกดิน (Thai Sunset)
description: A Thai themed dessert - saffron, lemongrass and coconut in a corn pudding base.
author: Queuetue

reviews.text: While probably not all day or every day vape for me, this is some wonderfully weird, tasty stuff. Turning a freakishly large amount of AP into very clearly a smooth, sweet corn pudding is one helluva neat trick and the lemongrass really completes it beautifully.

Thought this would be a novelty vape 3-5 mls before ripping out the cotton and changing flavors. It is not it's so sweet and smooth. Sweet corn pudding inhale and a nice lemongrass/lime exhale, but not overpowering at all
